speaker: cat
dialog: Man, I don't like this place. I'm feeling a little funny...

speaker: cat
dialog: I can't really describe it but I'M NOT FEELIN' GOOD.

speaker: cat
dialog: We've been to a lot of places, but this one...Something about this one FREAKS ME THE H*LL OUT.

speaker: cat
dialog: Speaking of which, there's a sign over there! Can you go up to it and read it? I'm illiterate. :(

speaker: froggie
dialog: Alrighty, let's go take a look. (To interact with stuff, press A in front of it.)
